title: King Charles Briefly Hospitalized
text:
King Charles, 76, was taken to the hospital Thursday after experiencing side effects from ongoing cancer treatment. He returned home the same day and canceled all engagements for Friday on medical advice.

The palace called it a “precautionary measure” and said his recovery remains on track. Despite the setback, the King’s April state visit to Italy is still expected to proceed.

A spokesman said: “His Majesty… is greatly disappointed to be missing them on this occasion and offers his deepest apologies.”
